column4: it's for a friend on a locked CGI client, AND is unable to get on any other client, because of where he's at

Saiki: I can't get into #ubuntu because I'm at a public computer and there's no CGI client to get into the channel, all of the clients I've tried are locked and I'm having some major issues installing an Nvidia driver. can someone pm me and help me please?
thats from my friend im only here to help him out now can anyone help
